name: Dear RED
description:
Not really scary, not really love... just the disturbance in her mind.

Red had grown, she understood what happened, why he always mentioned those words although she couldn't stand watching and being overwhelmed by the old memories all the time. Now that he's dead, it doesn't have to be so anymore...


So what exactly happened? I think you know, but not that way...
The game is translated by: Blurry Mind.
There are 16 endings, and some of them are short, some are long. The playtime will be longer or not, it all depends on you and your choices.
